name: Pineapple Upside-Down Bundt® Cake
author: Jamie Lowe
summary: A moist twist on the original pineapple upside-down cake.
ingredients: 1 (3.5 ounce) package instant vanilla pudding mix
¼ cup whole milk, or more as needed
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Grease fluted tube pan (such as Bundt®) with cooking spray with flour
Pour melted butter into the bottom of the prepared pan
Sprinkle brown sugar evenly on top
Drain pineapple rings over a measuring cup; reserve juice
Alternate placing halved pineapple rings and maraschino cherries around the pan
Combine cake mix and pudding mix in a large mixing bowl
Pour enough milk into the reserved pineapple juice to make 1 cup of liquid; add to cake and pudding mixture
Mix on low speed, adding 1 egg at a time until blended
Increase speed to medium; mix until thoroughly combined and smooth, about 2 minutes
Pour batter over pineapples and cherries in the pan
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, 33 to 40 minutes
Let cool for 10 minutes before removing from pan
